locations.name: Mount Everest Base Camp
locations.description: A challenging yet rewarding climb leading to the base camp of the world's highest peak.
locations.bestTimeToVisit: April to May, September to November

locations.name: Kanchenjunga
locations.description: The third-highest mountain in the world, offering a remote and technical climb.
locations.bestTimeToVisit: April to May, September to October

locations.name: Nanda Devi
locations.description: India's second-highest peak with stunning landscapes and challenging routes.
locations.bestTimeToVisit: May to June, September to October

locations.name: Stok Kangri
locations.description: A popular peak for trekkers and climbers seeking high-altitude adventure.

locations.name: Annapurna
locations.description: One of the deadliest and most technical climbs in the world.
locations.bestTimeToVisit: April to May, September to November

locations.name: Bhagirathi Peaks
locations.description: A trio of peaks that offer technical rock and ice climbing challenges.
locations.bestTimeToVisit: May to June, September to October

locations.name: Kedarnath Dome
locations.description: A prominent Himalayan peak with moderate to difficult climbing routes.

locations.name: Friendship Peak
locations.description: A great peak for beginner mountaineers with stunning panoramic views.

locations.name: Trishul
locations.description: A three-peak massif offering a rewarding but technical climb.
locations.bestTimeToVisit: April to June, September to October

locations.name: Chamser Kangri
locations.description: A high-altitude climb in Ladakh with breathtaking views of Pangong Lake.
